ygData.msgSnippet: Sorry, Daemos. I ll reply now :-) ... Zardus walks on his way to the CR room as Supernova s transmission reaches him. He taps his comm to reply. Permission

Sorry, Daemos. I'll reply now :-)

::Zardus::

Zardus walks on his way to the CR room as Supernova's transmission
reaches him. He taps his comm to reply.

"Permission granted," he says, "Join and do your best."

He then turns as he hears footsteps behind him, seeing Antagony. "Ah,
good. Welcome to the Alliance, Antagony. Did Perndabot already show you
around the base?"

As he was replying to the femm, his comm was sending a transmission to
Daemos. "Welcome to past earth," the transmission read, "This is Zardus,Alliance commander. I'm interested in your offer. Can you come to my
base or should I go to your location to discuss you working for the
Alliance?"




--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Jen D." <jeniff@h...> wrote:
> (ooc: im sorry if this is short. i have to go soon and have to type
> quick)
> +++ Supernova Flare Scrap Vycir Slasis +++
> 
> Supernova and his team were training in the holo rooms of the Iron
> Fist when they heard the Intergalaction Gladiator League's
> transmission. They continued training untill they were done with the
> session, and then Supernova opened his comm to Zardus.
> 
> "Commander," he transmitted to Zardus, "this is Supernova. Requesting
> permission to join the Gestalt League for the IGL."
> 
> 
> 
> Antagony had been looking for Zardus, and then she saw him walking
> through one of the hallways of the Iron Fist. She jogged to catch up
> with him, and finally reached him.
> 
> "Hello, sir," she said when she approached, "I'm Antagony, the new
> Alliance member. Perndabot said that I should talk to you."
> 
> 
> 
> Cepta saw Squacktalk get killed, turning around and running out of
> the room, trying to get as far away from that place as she could. She
> was very scared, and wasn't used at all to such violence.
